txt.en: Speak with Legolas near the entrance to Thûr Hin
Heal Legolas.
Legolas must not falter
As the brothers fall, Bahádring rushes deeper into the Well. Follow him!
Legolas must not falter
Attack Kormoltur
Investigate deeper into Thûr Hin, Lair of the Children\n<rgb=#ff0000>Legolas must not falter</rgb>
'Skin and bones, they are. Not worth cooking, barely worth fighting.'
Heal Legolas and fend off Daikhag.
'What does he want? Always spoiling my fun.'
'I trust you can handle these whelps, brother?'
'Nooo! My brother - for every drop of blood spilled you will be avenged tenfold.'
Listen to Kormoltur, Lord of Terror.
'You will all now know the pain of my axe.'
Listen to Khablag and Daikhag.
Speak with Legolas near the entrance to Thûr Hin.
Heal Legolas and fend off Daikhag\n<rgb=#ff0000>Legolas must not falter</rgb>\n<rgb=#ff0000>All Elven Menders must not falter</rgb>
Listen to Kormoltur, Lord of Terror
Listen to Khablag and Daikhag
Attack Kormoltur.
Investigate Thûr Hin and seek out the two Utûgi ahead.
Press deeper into Thûr Hin.
'These Orcs are formidable, older and larger than any I've yet seen.'
Temple of Utug-bûr: Thûr Hin, Lair of the Children -- Tier 1
Defeat Daikhag.

As you enter Thûr Hin, the Lair of the Children, the smell hits you. Dust and copper, like blood in your mouth. A dozen wars were born here, along with thousands of soldiers. In the distance, you can hear two Utûgi arguing amongst themselves, their voices echoing through the musty hall.
'Legolas has faltered!'
As you enter, you see a lone figure on a commanding throne
Defeat Kormoltur, Lord of Terror.
Defeat the Utûgi.
'I must thank you. You saved my life. That is no small thing.'
Legolas has fallen in battle!
'But there is no time to celebrate, I'm afraid.'
'We must pursue Azagath and more danger awaits us both, I am sure.'
'We will continue on the western path, you should hue to the east.'
Legolas has fallen in battle!
'We will meet in the end, I am sure of it.'
Daikhag has returned! He lets out a mighty roar as a challenge
'These Orcs are formidable, older and larger than any I've yet seen.'
'These Orcs are formidable, older and larger than any I've yet seen.'
'Nevertheless, we must say to them:'
As you enter, you see a lone figure on a commanding throne
'If it's a fight you want, you shall have it!'
Press deeper into Thûr Hin
'Any last words, Orc?'
'Trespassers.'
'What was that?'
'Kormoltur was asking after you.'
'Skin and bones, they are. Not worth cooking, barely worth fighting.'
'Augh...'
'What does he want? Always spoiling my fun.'
'Your healing is powerful stuff indeed. I feel much better.'
'Let's show these Orcs how keen our blades are!'
'Quickly! Finish him!'
'All the Elven Menders have faltered!\q
With a groan Khablag collapses, broken, to the ground
Heal Legolas!
'Trespassers.'
'What toys are these, that come into my throne room. Such small, weak things.'
'Do you even know what I am? I am old beyond years, and more powerful than you can dream.'
'Let us see you then, with your little sticks of metal. Do your worst.'
'Oh this will not do at all for sport. I'm afraid I must help you, in order to make this interesting.'
'Receive my blessing, though you are unworthy of it.'
'Play with my Utûgi. Let's see how you do.'
'You could barely handle two of my lesser Utûgi. I'm afraid that won't do.'
'Receive my next blessing, and play with my greater Utûgi.'
Your senses finally come to rest back at Tûl Zakana. You must press on
'Now, time for a bit of fun. Unfortunately, you still aren't much of a challenge as you are.'
Press deeper into Thûr Hin
As Bahádring falls you remember where you are. You smash the well to rubble so its power cannot be used or corrupted by the evil of Men again
Defeat Khablag\n<rgb=#ff0000>Legolas must not falter</rgb>
'Receive my final blessing, though you are unworthy of it.'
Listen to Khablag and Legolas
'Now you will face me!'
Heal Legolas!\n<rgb=#ff0000>Legolas must not falter</rgb>\n<rgb=#ff0000>All Elven Menders must not falter</rgb>
Investigate Thûr Hin and seek out the two Utûgi ahead.
Defeat Daikhag
Defeat Kormoltur, Lord of Terror
Defeat the Utûgi
'Trespassers.'
'Kormoltur was asking after you.'
'Oh, yes. They'll be my entertainment for the day, paltry as they are.'
'Try not to die too quickly, small ones.'
'I said, 'don't misjudge your enemy', Elf.'
Investigate deeper into Thûr Hin, Lair of the Children\nLegolas must not falter
Defeat Khablag.
'I curse this ground on which you walk.'
Listen to Khablag and Legolas.
'Shblug...'
Press deeper into Thûr Hin.
